Bank Stars Daily Total List Stars Weâ€™ve noticed that your desk has been inactive for too long. To achieve the most benefit from your Smartpods workstation, we recommend you move at least twice each hour. Alert! Please ensure that there are no obstacles around and under the desk. Active Stars You have added progress in your heart, keep up the good work. Health Risk Health Risk Scrore Low Medium High
Height Settings Current Height Set Stand Set sit The standing position needs to be greater than the sit position. The sitting position needs to be greater than the stand position. The difference between sitting and standing must be greater than. Your sit or stand height has been adjusted on this desk.

Congratulations!
You have been classified with a LOW health risk score. This is in part due to amount of movement that you are successfully completing on a daily basis at your desk. Keep up the great work and continue to move regularly throughout the day. You are showing EARLY indicators associated to a MEDIUM health score.
This could be due to a few reasons such as:
your BMI, Health survey score or daily desk movements. You are showing SEVERAL indicators associated to a HIGH health score.
This could be due to a several reasons such as:
your BMI, Health survey score or daily desk movements. Recommendations Status Pair

Desk Mode Automatic Desk Mode Runs through the activity cycle without the need of user acknowledgement. Manual Desk Mode Runs through the activity cycle manually. Interactive Desk Mode Runs through the activity cycle with the need of user acknowledgement.
Software Version Application Version Desk Firmware Warning: This computer program is protected by copyright law and international treaties. Unauthorized reproduction or distribution of this program, or any portion of it, may result in severe civil and criminal penalties, and will be prosecuted to the maximum extent possible under the law. Logout Logging out will direct you to the login screen. Would you like to logout?
Body Mass Index Weight / Height ( in2 ) This will classify you as: Underweight Underweight (<18.5) Healthy Weight (18.5 - 24.9) Overweight (25 - 29.9) Obese (>30) Height Weight Estimated calorie expenditure This is the estimated number of calories that you will be burning while using Smartpods. Basal Metabolic Rate Basal metabolic rate (BMR) is the amount of energy expanded while at rest.
Covid 19 Assessment Please answer the following questions of Covid 19 health assessment. Covid19 questions are not completed. Please go over and update each question. Geofencing is not supported on this device! Your geotification is saved but will only be activated once you grant allow permission to access the device location. Location permission required Starting from Android M (6.0), the system requires apps to be granted location access in order to scan for BLE devices.
